title: Our Services
description: Enjoy fast, reliable parcel delivery with real-time tracking and zero hassle. From personal packages to business shipments — we deliver on time, every time.

services.title: Express & Standard Delivery
services.description: We deliver parcels within 24–72 hours in Dhaka, Chittagong, Sylhet, Khulna, and Rajshahi. Express delivery available in Dhaka within 4–6 hours from pick-up to drop-off.

services.title: Nationwide Delivery
services.description: We deliver parcels nationwide with home delivery in every district, ensuring your products reach customers within 48–72 hours.

services.title: Fulfillment Solution
services.description: We also offer customized service with inventory management support, online order processing, packaging, and after sales support.

services.title: Cash on Home Delivery
services.description: 100% cash on delivery anywhere in Bangladesh with guaranteed safety of your product.

services.title: Corporate Service / Contract In Logistics
services.description: Customized corporate services which includes warehouse and inventory management support.

services.title: Parcel Return
services.description: Through our reverse logistics facility we allow end customers to return or exchange their products with online business merchants.
